name: cwrc-git-dialogs
description: Dialogs for listing, loading, and saving CWRC XML documents.
author: “James <“jc.chartrand@gmail.com”>

scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.precommit: npm run test && npm run check-coverage
scripts.browserify: mkdirp build && browserify test/development.js -o build/development.js --debug -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.test: mkdirp coverage && npm run test:electron && npm run generate-coverage
scripts.test:browser: browserify -t browserify-istanbul test/browser.js | browser-run  -p 2222 --static .  | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
scripts.test:electron: browserify -t browserify-istanbul test/browser.js | browser-run --static . | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
scripts.test:chrome: browserify -t browserify-istanbul test/browser.js | browser-run --static . -b chrome | node test/extract-coverage.js | faucet
